Export.Routine: #; for localizing text in CSP pages #def1arg LocalizeText(%args) $$FormatMessage^%occMessages(%response.Language,%args) #define EnsMsgError $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","ErrorOnly","Error") #define EnsMsgModified $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","Modified","Modified") #define EnsMsgReadOnly $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","ReadOnly","ReadOnly") #define EnsMsgOk $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","Ok","Ok") #define EnsMsgOn $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","On","On") #define EnsMsgOff $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","Off","Off") #define EnsMsgTrue $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","True","True") #define EnsMsgFalse $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","False","False") #define EnsMsgDeleting $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","Deleting","Deleting...") #define EnsMsgSaving $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","Saving","Saving...") #define EnsMsgRules $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","Rules","Rules") #define EnsMsgConditions $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","Conditions","Conditions") #define EnsMsgActions $$$LocalizeText("Ensemble","Actions","Actions")
